definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

pinyin: gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3

sentences.english: The first one probes into intellectual psychology of Sun li in liberated area of period mainly.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要探讨孙犁在解放区时期的知识分子心态。

sentences.english: The study of Marxism-Leninism will arm the intellectuals ideologically.
sentences.chinese: 学习马列主义将从思想上武装知识分子。

sentences.english: For both the left and right this means anti-intellectual.
sentences.chinese: 不管左派右派，这就代表反知识分子。

sentences.english: The erroneous attitude of not respecting intellectuals must be opposed.
sentences.chinese: 要反对不尊重知识分子的错误思想。
吕弗勒是我认识的一个花瓶一样的知识分子。

sentences.english: Prophetic intellects began to think of themodernization of country China.
sentences.chinese: 先知先觉的知识分子开始了乡土中国现代化的思考。

sentences.english: He likes to set himself up as an intellectual.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢自命为知识分子。

sentences.english: Yan Zhen's novels focus on the spiritual plight of intellectuals.
sentences.chinese: 阎真的小说专注于对知识分子精神困境的刻画。

sentences.english: Many of our local Party branches are still reluctant to let intellectuals join.
sentences.chinese: 许多地方党部，还不愿意吸收知识分子入党。

sentences.english: A group of higher or middle rank intellectuals have been admitted into the Party.
sentences.chinese: 一批优秀的高中级知识分子被吸收入党。

sentences.english: This way, they could kill off all the intellectuals of the society.
sentences.chinese: 这样，他就可以对全社会的知识分子大开杀戒了。

sentences.english: Personality structure of intellectuals are explored based on the hypothesis of lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 采用词汇学假设，探讨了知识分子的人格结构。

sentences.english: Liang Ding Fen was a representative of the intellectuals in the Late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 梁鼎芬是晚清知识分子的典型代表。

sentences.english: It was said that Teacher Zhang graduated from Qinghua University, a typical intellectual image.
sentences.chinese: 据说张老师是清华毕业，纯正的知识分子形象。

sentences.english: The room for honest speaking is far greater than Russian intellectuals make use of.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯知识分子并未利用诚实立言的自由。

pinyin: gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3

definition: Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
angry youth/positive term used to describe young Chinese with extreme nationalistic tendencies/see also 糞青|粪青[fen4 qing1]
stinking intellectual (contemptuous term for educated people during the Cultural Revolution)
